messages.message: When configuring email notifications for a deployment, is there a way to make sure that only the user assigned to the review gets notified? For example, if I configure the review queue to be round robin method for users in a particular group, can this be utilized for notifications too? Also, it would be great to have a dropdown option for the email addresses to only select users in the workspace, instead of typing them in

Not currently, but these could be future enhancements. Can you share which customer is interested in this, and possibly their expected review volume per reviewer? More for research - it's interesting to know about use-cases for these email notifications that wouldn't overload the reviewers' inboxes.
